name: Car Wash TD - Tower Defense
description:
Car Wash TD, a simple one-of-a-kind tower defense game.
Goal: wash cars before they reach the end of the road.


You have been hired by the government to create a system that washes cars directly on the road. To achieve your mandate, you have at your disposal water turrets of many kinds and many more advanced technologies.



Unleash your creativity and puzzle solving skills by creating mazes to make the path of the cars longer and increase the efficiency of your towers. Don’t worry about causing traffic, cleaning cars is your priority.













If you like tower defense games with a mix of maze creation, standard paths and many unique upgradable weapons, Car Wash TD is definitely for you!
